title: Domestic beer consumption in Canada by age group 2019
summary: The statistic shows the forecast of a golf player consumption in Canada 2019 , age group 2019 .
With data from five European countries it was beer that in 2019 approximately 22.4 % of golf players will be between 35_to_49 and 50_to_64 18_to_34 old .
gold: It was estimated that almost 39 percent of all beer sold in Canada was consumed by Canadians aged between 18 and 34 in 2019.
Those aged between 35 and 49 were the second biggest consumer group , drinking over almost 30 percent of all beer sold in Canada.
What types of beer do Canadians prefer ? According to sales figures , canned beer is the most popular type of domestic beer across age groups in Canada .
